oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Hidāyah al-Ṭālawīyah li-qurrāʼ al-ʻaqīdah al-Islāmīyah / lil-Shaykh Muḥammad Anīs al-Ṭālawī : manuscript, 1881
Sharḥ al-ʻaqīdah al-Islāmīyah
Hidāyah al-Ṭālawīyah li-qurrāʼ al-ʻaqīdah al-Islāmīyah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ṭālawī, Muḥammad Anīs , 1827-1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Ḥamzah, Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad Nasīb , 1820 or 1821-1887 or 1888

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الحمد لله الذي اعلمنا بالقواعد الايمنية ... :Incipit
انتهى 1298 وهذا اخر ما يسيره المولى الكريم واجرى به القلم ... :Colophon
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black punctuated in red.
According to colophon (f. 175r), this is a holograph copy completed in Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1298 AH [October or November, 1881 AD].
With two "taqrīẓs" written by Maḥmūd al-Ḥamzāwī (f. 175v) and Muḥammad al-Manīnī al-ʻUthmānī (f. 176r).
MS Arab 372. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islam--Doctrines
